taskName1: Find all the matching pairs as fast as you can. The game will be finished when there are no cards left on the playing field
taskName2: Turn over the cards one by one and find all the matching pairs as fast as you can. The game will be finished when there are no cards left on the playing field
taskName3: Turn over the cards one by one and find all the matching pairs as fast as you can. The game will be finished when there are no cards left on the playing field. Be attentive, some of the cards can be turned upside down
